title: English Speaking Proficiency Enhancement Program Based on 5E-Flipped e-Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level English grammar fundamentals and vocabulary comprehension
context.additional_context: A 5E-flipped e-learning-based English speaking program conducted in a mobile device-enabled microlearning environment for graduate students in science fields

learning_goals: After completing a flipped learning module following the 5E instructional model, learners can logically explain their field of study in English for more than one minute
Learners participate in peer feedback-based English speaking practice using interactive features of the e-learning platform with at least 80% engagement
Formative assessment shows a reduction of at least 30% in English speaking anxiety compared to pre-learning levels
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
